summary: This is a voluntary interview waiver form from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG). It documents that an employee named Thomas (last name unclear) was asked to provide information voluntarily as part of an OIG investigation, understood the warnings and assurances, and agreed to make a statement. The specific subject of the investigation is redacted.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: Employee of the U.S. Department of Justice who is voluntarily providing information as part of an OIG investigation. Signed the waiver form agreeing to answer questions.

events.title: OIG Form Revision
events.description: The OIG Form 111.226/2 used for this voluntary interview waiver was revised on this date.

keyFacts: The U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) was conducting an investigation, the specific subject of which is redacted in the document.
An employee named Thomas (last name unclear from the signature) voluntarily agreed to be interviewed and provide information as part of this OIG investigation.
The document is a standard OIG waiver form (Form 111.226/2) advising the employee of their rights and the voluntary nature of the interview.
